ruleExplore:
{
  "author": "class.author@text||tag.p.1@tag.a.0@text",
  "bookList": "@css:.library>li,.rank>li",
  "bookUrl": "class.bookname.0@href||tag.a.1@href",
  "coverUrl": "tag.img@src",
  "intro": "class.intro@text",
  "kind": "@css:.layui-badge@text&&p:contains(作者：) a:nth-child(3)@text&&p:contains(作者：)@textNodes@js:result.replace(/(字数|作者|分类)：\\s*/g, '').replace(/(\\d+)万/,'$1'+'0000')",
  "lastChapter": "class.chapter@tag.a@text##最新章节：",
  "name": "class.bookname@text||tag.a.1@text##\\[.*\\]"
}

ruleSearch:
{ "author": "tag.a.-1@href@js:\nresult=java.ajax('https:'+result);\nvar author=result.match(/作者是([^，]*)/);\nvar tag=result.match(/类型是([^，]*)/);\nvar cover=result.match(/src=\"([^\"]*?jpg)/);\nvar intro=result.match(/
([^<]*)/);\njava.put('tag',(tag) ? tag[1]:'');\njava.put('cover',(cover) ? cover[1]:'');\njava.put('intro',(intro) ? intro[1]:'');\n(author) ? author[1]:'';", "bookList": "[class=nav clearfix] span:lt(2)", "bookUrl": "tag.a.0@href", "coverUrl": "@js:java.get('cover')", "intro": "@js:java.get('intro')", "kind": "@js:java.get('tag')", "lastChapter": "##<\\/a>：([^<]+?)<\\/span>##$1###", "name": "tag.a.-1@text" }

{
  "author": "class.book_other.0@tag.span.0@text",
  "bookList": "@css:#sitembox > dl:lt(5)",
  "bookUrl": "dt a@href",
  "coverUrl": "dt img@_src@js:result.includes('nopic') ? 'http://uee.me/cRNKN' : result",
  "intro": ".book_des@text@js:result.trim()",
  "kind": "class.book_other.0@span:nth-of-type(n+2)@text##中|已",
  "lastChapter": "class.book_other.1@a@text&&class.book_other.1@span@text@js:\nString(result).replace(/（.+）/, '').replace(/,(\\d+-\\d+-\\d+).*/, '（$1）')",
  "name": "h3 a@text"
}
